addonDescription.message: The best way to download music from YouTube.

canCloseWindow.message: You can close this window now

serverUnavailable.message: Server is unavailable. Please try again later.

updateAvailable.message: A newer version of YTDown is available. You can update it using {this guide}.

serverOld.message: The current server supports an older version of YTDown. You are using $1 and the server reports the latest as $2. Downloading may behave unexpectedly or may not work at all.

serverInvalidVersionFormat.message: The server returned an invalid version format. Please try again later.

serverInvalidResponse.message: The server did not respond correctly. Please try again later.

noVideoID.message: Failed to retrieve the video ID. Please check if the video URL is in the correct format.

downloadUnknownError.message: An unexpected error occurred while downloading the file.

imageTooLarge.message: This image is too large. Please try selecting a different one.

imageInvalidType.message: This file is not an image. Please try selecting a different file.

imageUnknownError.message: An unexpected error occurred while saving the image. Please try again or select a different one.
